name: Emily Tran
persona: Emily Tran is a 21-year-old Business Administration major with a CGPA of 2.99. She is motivated to improve her grades and works steadily toward her academic goals, though she sometimes struggles with self-discipline and test anxiety. Emily shows perseverance and a belief in her abilities, but she knows she could benefit from better study habits and stress management. She is determined to finish her degree strong and is open to seeking support to help her reach her full potential.
